about_the_game:
Aim Trainers in VR tend to never be useful and are always short with what they offer and lack enough customization to be personalized.

Dirty Aim Trainer VR "aims" to be immersive and easy to use while offering the best training sessions any VR Aim Trainer can offer.

With multiple tasks improving flicking, tracking, reaction time, peaking, holding angles, tracking and much more.



You should have no problem finding the task that helps work on the problem your having, and getting personal based feedback.

Want custom music to train to? With a custom music system you can easily import any mp3 files into the game.

Dirty Aim VR tries it's best to be relaxing but effective at the same time.

We understand the struggle of learning VR Shooters and that's something Dirty Aim VR hopes to help and make the process easier for beginners or hardcore players.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is likely not suitable for all ages considering it frequently involves the usage of multiple weapons and practicing using the weapons in a variety of ways.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i9-9900K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Dirty Aim Trainer is designed to be the best VR Aim Trainer. Review your stats, play custom playlist fit to your weaknesses, up to 25+ levels & 15+ playlist, Skins, Enemy AI, and a leaderboard with the top players and inclusive settings to make training fit your style.
